description: A production-ready purchase management workflow to control and track the end-to-end lifecycle from purchase requisition through approvals, sourcing, purchase order issuance, goods receipt, invoice processing, and payment closure. The system provides sequential stage tracking with planned vs actual dates, delay calculations, auditability, and master-data driven dropdowns for consistent procurement operations.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow Register

columns.name: Serial No
columns.description: Sequential row number for internal tracking

columns.name: CompanyBranch
columns.description: Company entity or branch initiating the purchase

columns.name: Overall Current Stage
columns.description: Current stage number for quick filtering and dashboards

columns.name: Overall Owner User ID
columns.description: Primary owner responsible for moving the workflow forward

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Stage 1 delay in days (Actual1 - Planned1). If Actual1 blank, use TODAY() - Planned1; if Planned1 blank, blank.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Procurement category (IT, MRO, Raw Material, Services, etc.)

columns.name: SpecificationScope
columns.description: Technical specification or scope of work

columns.name: Required By Date
columns.description: Date by which goods/services are required

columns.name: Estimated Total Value
columns.description: Estimated total value (Quantity * Estimated Unit Price)

columns.name: Delay2
columns.description: Stage 2 delay in days (Actual2 - Planned2). If Actual2 blank, use TODAY() - Planned2; if Planned2 blank, blank.

columns.name: Rework Required Flag
columns.description: Yes/No - indicates PR returned for correction

columns.name: Delay3
columns.description: Stage 3 delay in days (Actual3 - Planned3). If Actual3 blank, use TODAY() - Planned3; if Planned3 blank, blank.

columns.name: No of Vendors Invited
columns.description: Count of vendors invited for quotation

columns.name: Vendor List Invited
columns.description: Comma-separated vendor IDs/names or link to list

columns.name: Delay4
columns.description: Stage 4 delay in days (Actual4 - Planned4). If Actual4 blank, use TODAY() - Planned4; if Planned4 blank, blank.

columns.name: Delay5
columns.description: Stage 5 delay in days (Actual5 - Planned5). If Actual5 blank, use TODAY() - Planned5; if Planned5 blank, blank.

columns.name: Delay6
columns.description: Stage 6 delay in days (Actual6 - Planned6). If Actual6 blank, use TODAY() - Planned6; if Planned6 blank, blank.

columns.name: Vendor Contact Person
columns.description: Vendor contact person for this PO

columns.name: Delay7
columns.description: Stage 7 delay in days (Actual7 - Planned7). If Actual7 blank, use TODAY() - Planned7; if Planned7 blank, blank.

columns.name: Expected Delivery Date
columns.description: Expected delivery date as per logistics

columns.name: Delay8
columns.description: Stage 8 delay in days (Actual8 - Planned8). If Actual8 blank, use TODAY() - Planned8; if Planned8 blank, blank.

columns.name: Delay9
columns.description: Stage 9 delay in days (Actual9 - Planned9). If Actual9 blank, use TODAY() - Planned9; if Planned9 blank, blank.

columns.name: Delay10
columns.description: Stage 10 delay in days (Actual10 - Planned10). If Actual10 blank, use TODAY() - Planned10; if Planned10 blank, blank.

columns.name: Payment Due Date
columns.description: Due date as per payment terms

columns.name: Delay11
columns.description: Stage 11 delay in days (Actual11 - Planned11). If Actual11 blank, use TODAY() - Planned11; if Planned11 blank, blank.

columns.name: Audit Flag
columns.description: Yes/No - indicates record selected for audit

stages.stage_description: Request initiation by user/department including item/service details, quantity, budget/cost center, and required-by date.
Validation of requirement, budget, and compliance; approval as per approval matrix.
RFQ issuance and collection of vendor quotations for comparison.
Technical/commercial evaluation, negotiation, and final vendor selection.
PO drafting, internal approval, and readiness for dispatch to vendor.
PO sent to vendor and vendor acknowledgement/confirmation captured.
Shipment tracking and delivery coordination until goods/services reach the delivery location.
Receipt confirmation, quantity/quality inspection, and GRN posting.
Invoice capture and matching against PO and GRN; discrepancy handling.
Payment proposal, approvals, and payment execution with reference capture.
Final closure of the purchase cycle, supplier performance capture, and lessons learned.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking the complete purchase lifecycle with sequential stages, planned/actual dates, delay calculations, and stage-specific operational fields.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Reference list of approved vendors and their commercial/tax/banking details for procurement and payment processing.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Reference list of items/services with standard descriptions, UOM, and category mapping.

sheets.name: Department Master
sheets.description: Reference list of departments for PR ownership and reporting.

sheets.name: Cost Center Master
sheets.description: Reference list of cost centers for budget allocation and accounting.

sheets.name: Project Master
sheets.description: Reference list of projects for project-based procurement tracking.

sheets.name: UOM Master
sheets.description: Reference list of units of measure.

sheets.name: Currency Master
sheets.description: Reference list of currencies used in procurement.

sheets.name: Tax Master
sheets.description: Reference list of tax codes and rates for PO and invoice processing.

sheets.name: Payment Terms Master
sheets.description: Reference list of payment terms for PO and vendor defaults.

sheets.name: Incoterms Master
sheets.description: Reference list of incoterms for logistics and delivery responsibility.

sheets.name: GL Account Master
sheets.description: Reference list of GL accounts for posting and reporting.

sheets.name: Approval Matrix
sheets.description: Approval routing rules based on amount, department, category, and purchase type.

sheets.name: Dropdown Values
sheets.description: Centralized dropdown lists for consistent data entry across the system.

sheets.name: Import Dump - Purchase Transactions
sheets.description: Optional dump/import sheet for bulk upload of PR/PO/GRN/Invoice/payment references from ERP or external systems before validation into the main workflow register.
